p: Daily data on indigenous DF cases were collected from China Notifiable Disease Surveillance System and Guangzhou Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) for the years 2006 to 2014. There were 240 cases with unknown street-level address in 2014. These cases were excluded in this study. DF cases were diagnosed according to the national diagnostic criteria of DF, including the epidemiological exposure history, clinical manifestations and laboratory confirmation [ 10].
